[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” overlay_dotted=”” css=”.vc_custom_1650360464153{margin-top: -100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”2805″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1651577293671{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

US Automation’ Environment Solutions assists with the conceptualization, design, manufacture, and installation of cutting-edge Effluent and WasteWater Treatment Plants.

We have a solemn obligation to our natural ecosystem, which provides us with resources and to which we return our garbage. Pollution restrictions around the world, combined with dwindling natural resources, need resource recovery and reuse, as well as effective waste treatment and disposal.

At US Automation, we aim for environmental harmony at all times. Our effluent treatment solutions for the surface finishing sector are based on the most up-to-date international waste minimization techniques.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” overlay_dotted=”” css=”.vc_custom_1650020586151{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2675″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Effluent Treatment Plant” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23232323″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Felectroplatingplants.com%2Fproduct%2Feffluent-treatment-plant%2F|target:_blank”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2676″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”Water Treatment Plant” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:center|color:%23232323″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Felectroplatingplants.com%2Fproduct%2Fwater-treatment-plant%2F|target:_blank”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” overlay_dotted=”” css=”.vc_custom_1650020586151{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” overlay_dotted=””][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Choose Us” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23232323″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Roof is one of the most experienced and respected building & construction firms for over a century. Roof have been transforming the ideas and visions of our clients into award-winning projects.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23888888″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]

  • Financial Responsibility to Our Clients
  • Superior Quality and Craftsmanship
  • Quality and Value to the Projects We Deliver
  • Highest Standards in Cost Control
  • On Time and on Budget
  • Real Focus on Customer Satisfaction
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Popular Questions” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23232323″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”For small projects like replacing a window or patching a wall, the answer is no. For larger projects, In an architect can add tremendous value and cost savings to your project.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23888888″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”It does make candidates stand out if they can call on examples from other areas of their lives, such as internships, part-time jobs or extracurricular activities,’ Neemita Mepani, graduate resourcing partner at AMEC, reflects.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23888888″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”It follow the STAR format when giving your examples. Explain the Situation, the Tasks you had to complete, the Actions you took and the Results of your actions. Place the most emphasis on the actions and the results.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23888888″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” overlay_dotted=””][vc_column]
